primary.context: Caller initially asked for a person, then agreed to try the AI, but the AI failed to look up the account.
primary.detail: The AI failed to verify the account using the provided contract ID and transferred the caller to concierge.

steps: Agent offered a 20-minute wait or the AI; caller chose the AI.
Agent attempted account lookup via phone number; caller did not know it.
Agent attempted account lookup via contract ID.
Caller provided a long contract ID.
Agent encountered a verification issue and transferred the call.

failure.detail: The agent reported an issue verifying the account after the user provided a valid-sounding contract ID.

clarifications.note: Caller did not know phone number on contract

actions.detail: Attempted lookup via phone number; user unknown.
Attempted lookup via contract ID; system error/issue.
Transferred to concierge after verification failure.

insights.summary: The caller initially wanted a human but tried the AI; the AI failed to verify the account using the contract ID provided and transferred the call.
insights.verbatim: I can continue with the automatic system.
insights.coaching: The agent should be verified if the contract ID length was valid for the system, as the number provided was quite long (12 digits).
